original: kun gyi dbus/_/rtag tu bzhugs pa khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/gang sku ud pal sngon
analyzed: kun gyi dbus/_/rtag tu bzhugs pa khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/gang sku ud pal sngon

original: po 'am/_/'thon 'thing bai dur+ya 'dra ba/_/bdud bzhi 'joms phyir zhal bzhi🔽ste/_/rtsha ba'i zhal ni nam mkha'i mdog_/g.yas zhal gser sbyangs gtsho ma

translated: with four faces to conquer the four māras,🔽with a wrathful face the color of the sky,🔽the right face the color of refined gold,🔽the left face the color of priyaṅgu,

original: 'dra/_/g.yon zhal pri yi ku lta bu/_/rgyab zhal pad+ma ra ga'i mdog_/rtsha zhal sgeg
analyzed: 'dra/_/g.yon zhal pri yi ku lta bu/_/rgyab zhal pad+ma ra ga'i mdog_/rtsha zhal sgeg
translated: the rear face the color of a ruby,🔽and the wrathful face is smiling.

original: pa'i zhal dang g.yas zhal rgod pa'i zhal/_/rgyab zhal dpa' ba'i zhal dang g.yon zhal
analyzed: pa'i zhal dang g.yas zhal rgod pa'i zhal/_/rgyab zhal dpa' ba'i zhal dang g.yon zhal
translated: The face on the right is a laughing face, the face on the back is a heroic face, and the face on the left is a terrifying face.

original: 'jigs rung ngo /_/gar dgu'i nyams kyi rab ldan pa/_/mgo phreng lnga bcu rtsha🔽gcig 'chang /_/stag gi lpags pa grol tshhul 'dzin/_/thod pa rin chen dbu

translated: He is endowed with the nine expressions of dance, wears a garland of fifty-one human heads,🔽and is draped with a tiger skin. He is adorned with a jeweled head ornament,

original: yi rgyan/_/bcu gnyis phyag gis mtshhon cha 'dzin/_/bdud kyi dpung 'joms
analyzed: yi rgyan/_/bcu gnyis phyag gis mtshhon cha 'dzin/_/bdud kyi dpung 'joms

analyzed: khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/rdo rje lpags pa da ma ru/_/dgra sta gri gug rtshe gsum mo/_/

analyzed: gdug gu snyan cha dang /_/dbu yi nor bu mchod phyir thogs/_/thal bar

analyzed: dpal la phyag 'tshhal/_/gang sku pad+ma ra ga ltar/_/dmar ba'i 'od kyi gsal

analyzed: bar byed/_/thod skam lnga bcu'i phreng 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje gri gug g.yas nyid de/

analyzed: shes rab yum la rtag tu gus/_/de ltar bcom ldan rdo rje'i bdag po la/_/ma
